meanings.definition: The state of being a coagent.
meanings.sent1: Their successful project was a result of the coagency between the two teams.
meanings.sent2: The coagency of the two detectives led to the capture of the criminal.
meanings.sent3: The coagency between the chef and the baker created a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: The coagency of the siblings in planning the surprise party was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The coagency of the students in the group project impressed the teacher.

meanings.definition: The action of working together as coagents.
meanings.sent1: The successful completion of the mission required coagency among all team members.
meanings.sent2: The coagency of the firefighters saved the building from burning down.
meanings.sent3: The coagency between the dog and the cat in catching the mouse was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The coagency of the dancers on stage was a beautiful display of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The coagency of the doctors in the emergency room saved many lives.
